name: Super Spartacus Run
description:
Start your Jabber greek world run super adventure! Run over millions of enemy arrows and stay alive - avoid to get the high score!
- Unlimited jabber world run adventure
- old school world graphics
- tons of arrows obstacles to avoid
- addictive adventure and challenging gameplay
- super jump adventure for arrows avoid
- super adventures with double jump Jabber hero
Jabber unlimited run from the battlefield to reach his home in unlimited platform run! Super fast warrior can challenge friends and win super high score in whole ancient antic Greek world!
